document_data.name: Gardens of Markharh
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gardens of Markharh''' was a public garden located in the city of [[Dhaztanar]] in [[Semphar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Gardens of Markharh were located within the [[Furdah Rustauk District]] in southwest Dhaztanar. The sat in the northeast section of the district just a block from the walls of the [[Madinat]].
document_data.Description: The small wall enclosed the gardens and they were accessible by a single road.
